articles.title: Hedge funds cut Magnificent Seven in last quarter, Goldman says - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Hedge funds pared exposure to the Magnificent Seven megacap tech stocks in the fourth quarter amid signs of extremes in the market, according to Goldman...
articles.content:
(Bloomberg) Hedge funds pared exposure to the Magnificent Seven megacap tech stocks in the fourth quarter amid signs of extremes in the market, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.
